description:
Kyoya is forced to wear a white coat. It seems today`s club activity is playing doctor.
The members of the GJ Club appear before Kyoya one by one as his patients.
As Kyoya is getting used to it, he notices Kirara staring at something on the ceiling and grows concerned. Apparently they need a sacrifice to exorcise the thing!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoro on the GJ Line, REBIRTH
